citation: Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment (Regulated Activities) Regulations 2017 (Tas)
text:
Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment (Regulated Activities) Regulations 2017

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 .

18 July 2017

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

MATTHEW GROOM

Minister for State Growth acting for and on behalf of the Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Amendment (Regulated Activities) Regulations 2017 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations takes effect on 1 August 2017.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

6.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Regulations 2014 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 July 2017
